quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因“homo-”（相同）和“-nym”（名称）的词根误导，将“homonym”误判为“同义词”，或混淆其与“同音异义词”的区别
quiz_item.sentence: The word "bank" is a classic example of a **homonym** because it can mean both a financial institution and the edge of a river.

option.definition: (in language) a word that has the same spelling or pronunciation as another word but a different meaning
a word that has the same meaning as another word
a word that has the same pronunciation as another word but a different meaning
a word that has the opposite meaning to another word
